data_table.description: CSQR (Coping Strategies Questionnaire-Revised) - The dataset queries participants about strategies/behaviors they have applied to cope with pain.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: CSQ_DISTANTFROMPAIN
variable.description: 1. Try to feel distant from pain (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_THINKSOMETHINGPLEASANT
variable.description: 2. Try to think of something pleasant (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_NEVERGETBETTER
variable.description: 3. Feel its never going to get better (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_TELLSELFBEBRAVE
variable.description: 4. Tell myself to be brave and carry on despite the pain (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_OVERCOMEPAIN
variable.description: 5. Tell myself I can overcome the pain (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_OVERWHELMSME
variable.description: 6. It's awful and I feel that it overwhelms me (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_LIFENOTWORTHLIVING
variable.description: 7. Feel life is not worth living (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)
variable.comment: Sensitive data item nullified for all subjects

variable.name: CSQ_PRAYWONTLASTLONG
variable.description: 8. Pray it won't last long (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_SOMETHINGSEPARATE
variable.description: 9. Think of it as something separate (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_DONTTHINKABOUTPAIN
variable.description: 10. Don't think about the pain (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_CANTLETPAINSTANDINWAY
variable.description: 11. Can't let pain stand in the way of what I have to do (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_DONTPAYATTENTIONTOIT
variable.description: 12. Don't pay any attention to it (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_PRETENTITSNOTTHERE
variable.description: 13. Pretend its not there (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_WORRYWHETHERITWILLEND
variable.description: 14. Worry all the time about whether it will end (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_REPLAYPLEASANTEXPERIENCES
variable.description: 15. Replay in mind pleasant experiences of the past (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_THINKOFPEOPLEENJOY
variable.description: 16. Think of people I enjoy doing things with (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_PRAYFORPAINTOSTOP
variable.description: 17. Pray for the pain to stop (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_IMAGINEOUTSIDEOFBODY
variable.description: 18. Imagine that pain is outside of body (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_GOONASNOTHINGHAPPENED
variable.description: 19. Just go on as if nothing happened (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_KEEPONGOING
variable.description: 20. Although it hurts, I keep on going (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_CANTSTANDITANYMORE
variable.description: 21. Feel I can't stand it anymore (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_IGNOREIT
variable.description: 22. Ignore it (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_FAITHINGOD
variable.description: 23. Rely on faith in God (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_CANTGOON
variable.description: 24. Feel like I can't go on (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_THINKTHINGSENJOYDOING
variable.description: 25. Think of things I enjoy doing (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_DOTHINGSENJOY
variable.description: 26. Do things I enjoy like watching TV or listening to music (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_NOTPARTOFME
variable.description: 27. Pretend it's not a part of me (0=Never do that, 6=Always do that)

variable.name: CSQ_DISTRACTION
variable.description: CSQ: Distraction Scale (0-6 scale)

variable.name: CSQ_CATASTROPHIZING
variable.description: CSQ: Catastrophizing Scale (0-6 scale)

variable.name: CSQ_IGNORINGPAIN
variable.description: CSQ: Ignoring Pain Scale (0-6 scale)

variable.name: CSQ_DISTANCING
variable.description: CSQ: Distancing Scale (0-6 scale)

variable.name: CSQ_COPING
variable.description: CSQ: Coping Scale (0-6 scale)

variable.name: CSQ_PRAYING
variable.description: CSQ: Praying Scale (0-6 scale)
